recivedSteps

void recivedSteps(int noSteps)
The Function called when the application receive new steps from the step counter deamon. 1.It increment steps vairble and serversteps 2. Update Steps view with the new steps 3.when serversteps become more that 50 it call handelSocketConnection function.

Parameters:
noSteps - new steps received from the step counter deamon.

handelSocketConnection

void handelSocketConnection()
The function send number of serversteps to step up server and set serversteps to zero
